rows.label: tev061901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev061901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Nosusu about the weather in Noctilum.

rows.label: tev061901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev061901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Nosusu about recent developments.

rows.label: tev061901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Nosusu about the indigens in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Nosusu about recent developments.

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0001
rows.name: Well, attacks are hard to land when fog come out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0002
rows.name:
And thunderstorm give shocky-shocky attacks even
bigger jolt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0003
rows.name:
Also, more floating sparklies than usual come out
at night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Sparklies make some mysterious powers stronger
and make Skells run better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0005
rows.name:
As Nopon always say, if friend does not like weather
in Noctilum, wait one minute. Or else gear up by
buying lots of traditional Nopon leaf umbrellas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Koko say that red hat of Nosusu is very fashionable.
So nice! ...Also smart. But mostly nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0009
rows.name:
Koko think it will be instant seller because it helps
people stand out in dark forest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0010
rows.name: Nosusu hope it will be hit with everyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh-ho-hooooo! Nosusu has to sell a ton and contribute
for Koko![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0016
rows.name:
Critters here can change bodies to blend in with
environment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0017
rows.name:
Some are so good that they stop showing up on radar
of friends, so make sure to look around before plowing
ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Oh! And machines belonging to Ganglion or
whatever they are called have also been roaming
around in forest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0019
rows.name:
If one sees friend, run like wind! Machines are way
meaner than most other critters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0012
rows.name: Koko say pom-pom hat of Nosusu is adorable. So nice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Koko think it will be instant seller because it helps
bring out inner cuteness of wearer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0014
rows.name: Nosusu hope this is case![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev061901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oh-ho-hoooo! Nosusu has to sell a ton and contribute
for Koko![ST:wait ]
